name: Snowscape 7
description: Maneuverable and ultra stable on or off track, Snowscape 7 uses 3D construction for consistent behavior. It's ideal for sport & recreational skiers.

name: Equipe 8 Skate
description: Equipe 8 Skate is fast and light for great speed and nimble agility, but builds confidence with extra stability.

name: S/Lab Carbon Skate Yellow
description: For athletes who push skate-skiing to the highest level of performance. S/Lab Carbon Skate Yellow combines pure power with exceptional lightweight. Optimized for universal/compact snow conditions

name: S-Lab Classic Blue Med
description: For athletes who push classic skiing to the highest level of performance. S-Lab Classic Blue combines pure precision with exceptionally light weight. Optimum for hard wax snow conditions.

name: RS Skate
description: The RS Skate combines the key benefits of each S-LAB Skate models but uses a forgiving and lightweight D-Carbon core for improved ease of use and stability. With its versatile camber, G5 World Cup base and structure, the RS ensures a fast glide in all conditions.

name: S/Race Skin Soft
description: Racing performance from 7 am to 7 pm. In longer races and all day events, conditions change. S/Race Skin incroporates Formula Pomoca Skin for true race speed and confidence in all snow conditions. Win without kick wax.

name: Equipe 6 Skate
description: For an easy combination of performance, stability and predictability, this gliding ski delivers stability and ease with great performance.

name: RC Classic Hard
description: The RC Classic combines the key benefits of the top performance S-LAB Classic models, but uses a forgiving and lightweight D-Carbon Core to provide a smoother kick. With its versatile camber, G5 World Cup base and structure, the RC ensures fast glide in all conditions.

name: Equipe 8 Skin X-Stiff
description: Experience classic performance without the challenge of daily waxing. Equipe 8 Skin's SKINGRIP inserts deliver precise, secure grip and silent, fast gliding for skiers who demand performance in various snow conditions.
